May 13, 1979 D Oxfordshire & District Brass Band Association Entertainment Contest (Section D)
Oxfordshire & District Brass Band Association Entertainment Contest (Section D) 50 Entertainments Contest Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest oxfordshire-district-brass-band-associat-4122
None
Abbey Hall, Abingdon, Oxfordshire, England, UK The programme lists four adjudicators, two of which seem likely for music, two for presentation. They are, as listed in the programme, Capt. M. G. Lane, Ian Morrish, Simon Park and Major F. R. Sillitoe. If you know who adjudicated which section, please let us know.
Presentation: 1 Kidlington B 2 Abbey Brass 3 Stonesfield
March 28, 2013, 6:43 p.m. May 27, 2014, 7:03 a.m.

3 Abbey Brass Chris Macklow
